duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete standard work process and follow work instructions, procedures, and rotate as required.
Operate complex manufacturing equipment under supervision.
Escalate technical and process issues to the appropriate support groups and leaders.
Demonstrate a high level of professionalism.
Exemplary attendance and punctuality are crucial for the team to achieve success.
Demonstrated ability to learn new skills & adapt to new work environments.
Must have command of the English language, both written and verbal.
Must be at least 18 years of age to start as a full-time Production Associate upon successful completion of the program.

education_certification.credential: Completed 7-weeks of full-time training at Austin Community College in Electronics, Robotics Programming, Mechanical Systems, and Production best practices.
Must be at least 18 years of age upon successful completion of the program.
